whenSpriteCollidedWithYellowHearts: สัมผัสหัวใจสีเหลือง
whenSpriteCollidedWithPurpleHearts: สัมผัสหัวใจสีม่วง
whenSpriteCollidedWithRedHearts: สัมผัสหัวใจสีแดง
whenSpriteCollidedWithBottomEdge: สัมผัสขอบล่าง
whenSpriteCollidedWithLeftEdge: สัมผัสขอบซ้าย
whenSpriteCollidedWithRightEdge: สัมผัสขอบขวา
whenSpriteCollidedWithTopEdge: สัมผัสขอบบน
whenUp: เมื่อกดลูกศรขึ้น
whenUpTooltip: ทำคำสั่งด้านล่างเมื่อมีการกดปุ่มขึ้น.
dropletBlock_addItemsToScene_description: Add new items to the scene.
dropletBlock_addItemsToScene_param0_desc: The type of items to be added.
dropletBlock_addItemsToScene_param1_desc: The number of items to add.
dropletBlock_changeScore_param0_descript: The value to add to the score (negative values will reduce the score).
dropletBlock_moveEast_description: Moves the character to the east.
dropletBlock_moveNorth_description: Moves the character to the north.
dropletBlock_moveSouth_description: Moves the character to the south.
dropletBlock_moveWest_description: Moves the character to the west.
dropletBlock_playSound_param0_descriptio: The name of the sound to play.
dropletBlock_setBackground_param0_descri: The name of the background image.
dropletBlock_setItemActivity_description: Set the activity mode for an item.
dropletBlock_setItemActivity_param0_desc: The index (starting at 0) indicating which item's activity should change.
dropletBlock_setItemActivity_param1_desc: The name of the activity mode ('chaseGrid', 'roamGrid', or 'fleeGrid').
dropletBlock_setSprite_param0_descriptio: The index (starting at 0) indicating which actor should change.
dropletBlock_setSprite_param1_descriptio: The name of the actor image.
dropletBlock_setWalls_description: Changes the walls in the scene.
dropletBlock_setWalls_param0_description: The name of the wall set ('border', 'maze', 'maze2', or 'none').
dropletBlock_whenDown_description: This function executes when the down button is pressed.
dropletBlock_whenLeft_description: This function executes when the left button is pressed.
dropletBlock_whenRight_description: This function executes when the right button is pressed.
dropletBlock_whenTouchItem_description: This function executes when the actor touches any item.
dropletBlock_whenUp_description: This function executes when the up button is pressed.
